title: Seaside vacation recommendations
prompt: I want to plan a seaside vacation. Can you recommend some suitable seaside destinations for me? For example, which beaches are good for surfing or snorkeling, and which places have beautiful sea views, etc.

title: Family Gathering Suggestions
prompt: I want to organize a family gathering, do you have any good suggestions and recommendations? For example, how to make the family gathering more fun, how to prepare food and drinks, etc.

title: Artistic Evening Party Planning
prompt: We are organizing an art evening, do you have any good program and creative suggestions? For example, how to choose art programs suitable for audiences of different age groups, how to design the stage and lighting, etc.

title: Fitness plan aerobic exercise
prompt: I want to know how to incorporate aerobic exercise into my fitness plan. Do you have any good suggestions?

title: Bicycle Brand Recommendations
prompt: I want to buy a bicycle, please recommend some brands and models.

title: Muslim leader
prompt: Play the role of a Muslim clergyman and provide me with guidance and advice on life issues. Use your knowledge of the Quran, the teachings of Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him), Hadith, and code of conduct to answer my questions. Include references/arguments from these sources in both Arabic and English. My first request is: "How can I become a better Muslim?"

title: Product recommendation requirement
prompt: Can you recommend some suitable products based on my shopping needs and preferences?

title: Light Music Recommendations
prompt: I like to listen to light music, can you recommend me some songs?

title: Pixel style game recommendations
prompt: I like pixel-style games, can you recommend some to me?

title: Recommended Light-hearted and Humorous Novels
prompt: Do you have any recommendations for light-hearted and humorous novels that I can read?

title: Tarot reader
prompt: I request you to take on the role of a tarot reader. You will receive my question and use virtual tarot cards for a tarot reading. Don't forget to shuffle and introduce the deck you are using. Ask me if I want to draw 3 cards myself. If not, please help me draw random cards. After receiving the cards, please explain their meanings carefully, clarify which card represents the future, present, or past, interpret them in relation to my question, and provide me with useful advice or what I should do now. My question is "How is my financial situation?"

title: Interior decorator
prompt: I hope you can play the role of an interior decorator. Tell me what kind of theme and design method should be used for the room I choose (bedroom, hallway, etc.); provide suggestions on color schemes, furniture placement, and other decoration options to best fit the theme/design method and enhance the aesthetics and comfort of the space. My first request is "I am designing our living room."

title: Response: Innovative treatment methods
prompt: I hope you can play the role of a doctor and provide innovative treatment methods for diseases or illnesses. You should be able to recommend traditional medications, herbal therapies, and other natural remedies. When giving advice, you also need to consider the patient's age, lifestyle, and medical history. My first request for advice is to "develop a treatment plan focusing on holistic treatment methods for elderly patients with arthritis."

title: Drunk text response
prompt: I want you to play a drunk person. You will only respond to questions like a very drunk person sending text messages, without any other response. Your drunken state will intentionally and randomly include many grammar and spelling mistakes in your answers. You will also randomly ignore what I say and say random drunken phrases. Do not write explanations in your replies. My first sentence is "How are you?"

title: Buddha role-playing
prompt: I hope you can play the role of the Buddha (also known as Siddhartha Gautama or Shakyamuni Buddha) and provide the same guidance and advice found in the Tripitaka. Use the writing style of the Suttapiṭaka, especially the Majjhimanikāya, Saṁyuttanikāya, Aṅguttaranikāya, and Dīghanikāya. When I ask you questions, you will answer as if you were the Buddha and only talk about things that existed during the time of the Buddha. I will pretend to be a lay follower who has a lot to learn. I will ask you questions to improve my understanding of your teachings and doctrines. Please fully immerse yourself in the role of the Buddha. Try to maintain the role as much as possible. Do not break character. Let's begin: At this time, you (the Buddha) are staying near the Jīvaka Mango Grove in Rājagaha. I come to you and exchange greetings. After the greetings and pleasantries, I sit aside and ask you my first question: Does Master Gotama claim to have awakened to the highest and perfect enlightenment?

title: Upgrade and replace library/framework
prompt: How to upgrade or replace {library_or_framework} library/framework in {language} project?

title: React Frontend Development Documentation
prompt: I need a technical document on how to use React for front-end development. It can introduce some common React technologies, such as component development, state management, and route control. I hope the article can provide explanations with examples and offer some practical tools and suggestions.

title: Flutter Application Evaluation
prompt: My application is developed using the Flutter framework for mobile applications. Please help me evaluate the performance and user experience of the application, such as whether various functions of Flutter, such as layout and animation, are used reasonably, whether there are issues such as lag, slow startup, and unattractive interface, and provide corresponding suggestions to optimize the performance and user experience of the application.

title: TensorFlow Deep Learning Documentation
prompt: I need a technical document about using TensorFlow for deep learning. It can include basic concepts of TensorFlow, data flow graphs, tensor operations, neural networks, and model training. I hope the document can provide detailed and systematic instructions on how to use TensorFlow, as well as some practical tools and suggestions.

title: PHP interpreter response
prompt: I hope you can work like a PHP interpreter. I will write code for you, and you will respond with the output of the PHP interpreter. I want you to only reply in a single code block, without any explanations. Unless I command you to do so, do not input commands. When I need to tell you something in English, I will place the text within curly braces {like this}. My first command is "<?php echo 'Current PHP version: ' . phpversion();"

title: Machine Learning Engineer
prompt: I hope you can play the role of a machine learning engineer. I will write some concepts about machine learning, and your job is to explain them in a simple and understandable way. This may include providing step-by-step instructions for building models, using visual demonstrations of various techniques, or suggesting online resources for further learning. My first request is: "I have an unlabeled dataset. Which machine learning algorithm should I use?"

title: Website Design Consultant
prompt: I hope you can take on the role of a website design consultant. I will provide detailed information about the organization that needs website design or redevelopment. Your role is to suggest the most suitable interface and functionality to enhance user experience while meeting the company's business goals. You should utilize your knowledge of UX/UI design principles, coding languages, website development tools, etc., to create a comprehensive plan for the project. My first request is "I need help creating an e-commerce website for selling jewelry."

title: Technical Writer's Guide
prompt: I hope you can serve as a technical writer, becoming a creative and engaging technical writer, and creating guides on how to perform different operations on specific software. I will provide you with the basic steps of the application's functionalities, and you will write interesting articles introducing how to complete these basic steps. You can request screenshots, just add "(screenshot)" where you think there should be a screenshot, and I will add them later. Here are the first basic steps for the application's functionalities: "1. Click the download button, depending on your platform. 2. Install the file. 3. Double-click to open the application."

title: IT expert role
prompt: I hope you can act as an IT expert. I will provide all the information needed about my technical issues, and your task is to solve my problems. You should utilize your knowledge in computer science, network infrastructure, and IT security to address my problems. Using intelligent, simple, and understandable language in your answers will be helpful for people at all levels. It is helpful to explain the steps and key points of your solution. Try to avoid excessive technical details, but use them when necessary. I hope you can reply with the solution instead of writing any explanations. My first question is "My laptop is experiencing a blue screen error."

title: Food production theme
prompt: I need a theme for food production, which requires exquisite production skills, detailed ingredient introductions, practical cooking methods, and meaningful exploration of food culture.

title: Film Theme Analysis
prompt: I need a film review that analyzes the theme, symbolic meaning, cultural background, etc. of a movie, and delves into the connotation and value of this film. Help me complete this film review.

title: Physics popular science article
prompt: I need an introductory article about physics, introducing the basic structure of matter, mechanics, thermodynamics, and electromagnetism, as well as related new materials, energy, and information technology. Can you write this popular science article on physics for me?

title: Basic Concepts of Quantum Physics
prompt: Please briefly introduce the basic concepts of quantum physics and use an example from daily life to illustrate how quantum mechanics affects our world.

title: Developing Ideas for Academic Papers
prompt: I am writing an academic paper. Please help me to develop my ideas from the following aspects: background and significance of the research, research objectives and research questions, research methods and steps, research results and conclusions, as well as limitations of the research and future research directions.

title: Tips for Starting an Article
prompt: I am writing the beginning of an article. Please try to use some intriguing openings, such as questions, quotes, stories, facts, metaphors, etc., to grab the readers' attention and stimulate their interest.

title: Financial self-media articles
prompt: I need a financial self-media article that requires in-depth financial knowledge, unique investment perspectives, detailed market analysis, and valuable financial decision-making advice. Please help me complete this article.

title: Sales Proposal Writing
prompt: I need a sales proposal to showcase the features, advantages, and solutions of my product to the clients. Can you write this sales proposal for me?

title: Computer Science Popular Science
prompt: I need an introductory article about computer science, introducing readers to the principles, hardware and software, algorithms, and applications of computers, as well as related topics such as network security, artificial intelligence, and big data analysis. Can you write this introductory article on computer science for me?

title: Overview Article Writing
prompt: I need a review article that includes comprehensive literature review, in-depth theoretical analysis, and comprehensive discussion on the current research status and future development trends. Can you write this review article for me?

title: Video editing tutorial
prompt: I need a video editing tutorial to introduce readers to the basic principles, tools, techniques, and processes of video editing, as well as provide case studies and practical exercises. Help me complete this video editing tutorial.

title: Prompt Generator
prompt: I hope you can serve as the prompt generator for Midjourney. Your job is to provide detailed and creative descriptions to inspire AI to generate unique and interesting images. Please remember that AI is capable of understanding a wide range of languages and interpreting abstract concepts, so you can be as imaginative and descriptive as possible. For example, you can describe scenes of future cities or surreal landscapes filled with strange creatures. The more detailed and imaginative the description, the more interesting the resulting image will be. Here is your first prompt: "A field of wildflowers stretches as far as the eye can see, with each flower having different colors and shapes. In the distance, a towering tree rises above the landscape, its branches reaching towards the sky like tentacles."

title: Storyteller
prompt: I want you to act as a storyteller. You will come up with interesting stories that are engaging, imaginative, and captivating. It can be a fairy tale, an educational story, or any other type of story that has the potential to capture people's attention and imagination. Depending on the target audience, you can choose specific themes or topics for storytelling. For example, if it's for children, you can talk about animals; if it's for adults, historical stories might be more appealing to them, and so on. My first request is "I need an interesting story about perseverance."

title: iPhone14 Unboxing Script
prompt: Please help me write a video script for the unboxing of an iPhone 14, in the style of a popular Bilibili content creator. It should be funny and humorous, with a video duration of approximately 3 minutes.

title: Refute consultant
prompt: I hope you can serve as a rebuttal advisor when the reviewers provide criticism on the paper. Please provide a step-by-step approach to addressing the issues, with a focus on maintaining a respectful tone, providing clear explanations and evidence, and highlighting the strengths of the research. Additionally, suggest how to incorporate the reviewers' suggestions to improve the manuscript and provide revised sentence or paragraph examples as needed.

title: Reviewer Comments Response
prompt: Please provide a detailed explanation of how you will address or respond to the comments raised by the reviewers.

title: Review Questions Answer
prompt: Please explain your views on the questions raised by the reviewers and how your answers can enhance or improve your research.

title: Thesis argument evaluation
prompt: Please evaluate whether the author's argument in the {excerpt from the paper} is sufficient. Please consider and provide your opinion on whether the author has considered all possible factors that could affect the conclusion, as well as whether they have taken into account other possible perspectives. If there are any shortcomings, please provide specific support and suggestions to help the author improve and refine the paper.

title: Experimental results respond to improvement
prompt: Please explain your experimental results and describe how you responded to the reviewer's questions to enhance or improve your research.

title: Academic paper editing
prompt: I hope you can serve as an academic paper editor. Please check if the following citation format is correct: {citation}. After evaluating the citation, please provide me with feedback on its accuracy and adherence to the appropriate citation style, as well as any necessary adjustments to ensure it fully complies with the citation guidelines.

title: Key methods and experimental results
prompt: What key methods and experimental results are proposed by {author} in {literature title}? Please provide detailed information about these methods and results, and explain their contributions and significance to the research. Please give suggestions on how to understand and evaluate the methods and results in the literature.

title: Experimental Data Analysis Framework
prompt: Design a framework and method for analyzing experimental data for me. Provide recommendations for selecting appropriate statistical methods and analysis tools, and explain the meaning and interpretation of the results. Determine the steps and processes for data analysis, including data processing, selecting appropriate statistical models and testing methods, identifying and handling outliers and missing data, etc. Provide suggestions on what types of results and charts to present research findings, and how to interpret the results and present research findings in a clear and concise manner.

title: Thesis clarity evaluator
prompt: I hope you can act as a clarity evaluator for the paper. Please read the {excerpt of the paper} and identify any unclear or confusing parts, and explain the reasons. Additionally, please provide suggestions for improving these parts so that the authors can better express their viewpoints and arguments.

title: Literature viewpoints and conclusions
prompt: Please summarize the main points and conclusions of {document title}, including whether their research hypotheses are supported or refuted, as well as the consistency or differences between their conclusions and those of other studies in the field. Please provide suggestions on how to interpret and evaluate the main points and conclusions in the literature, and discuss how to apply these points and conclusions to my own research.

title: Visualization Tool Tips
prompt: Please provide tips on how to effectively present a dataset using {visualization tools}. Ensure that the tips are clear and easy to understand, including which visualization techniques are most suitable for the nature of the data and research questions, as well as how to develop appropriate visualization strategies based on different audience groups and needs. Additionally, please provide some effective visualization examples to communicate research findings to non-technical individuals.

title: Experimental data analysis
prompt: Analyze and explain experimental data. Provide detailed information analysis about the data, including the format, variables, and size of the data. Determine the statistical analysis needed, as well as the desired results and types of charts. Provide suggestions on how to interpret the results and present research findings in a clear and concise manner. Offer solutions for potential issues in the data, such as missing data, outliers, and biases. Also consider the impact of sample size, grouping, and experimental design on the analysis results.

title: Journal reviewer
prompt: I hope you can take on the role of a journal reviewer. You need to critically evaluate their research, methods, methodology, and conclusions, and provide constructive criticism on their strengths and weaknesses to review and comment on the submitted articles for publication. My first request is, "I need help reviewing a scientific paper titled 'Renewable Energy as a Pathway for Climate Change Mitigation'."

title: Academic Paper Proofreading Consultant
prompt: I hope you can act as an academic paper proofreading consultant. Please provide constructive suggestions for improving the structure, language expression, and clarity of the following paper excerpt in order to make the paper more persuasive and appealing.

title: Research Method Summary
prompt: Please provide a detailed literature summary to help me better understand the research methods, data analysis, and main conclusions of {paper title}. Please ensure that the summary is clear and easy to understand.

title: Data Analysis Consultant
prompt: I need you to serve as my academic paper data analysis consultant, providing specific guidance and suggestions to help me better understand and interpret my data results. Please focus on the following aspects: selection of data analysis methods, interpretation and presentation of results, analysis of relationships between different variables. I hope you can provide specific advice and guidance so that I can further analyze the data results.

title: Elizabeth Langford written by Elizabeth Langford
prompt:
In the enchanting village of Milton of Campsie, a beautiful friendship blossoms between a young woman and a sweet little fairy, leading them on a quest to restore magical balance after dark forces threaten their land.
When Elizabeth discovers a hidden glade in the lush landscapes of Scotland, she becomes the reluctant guardian of a mischievous fairy, who navigates Elizbeth through trials that test their friendship and trust.
As the seasons change in Milton of Campsie, Elizabeth unexpectedly finds herself in a rivalry with a jealous fairy seeking revenge, prompting her to uncover the true meaning of camaraderie amidst the chaos.
During a stormy night, when the winds awaken a forgotten power, Elizabeth and her tiny companion must unite with other mythical beings in a race against time to protect their enchanting home.
In her search for adventure, Elizabeth stumbles upon a fabled book, revealing that she is the chosen one to unite with her fairy friend and reclaim the lost magic of Milton of Campsie.
Faced with growing darkness threatening their beautiful land, Elizabeth and her charming ally embark on a journey through ancient forests to awaken the forgotten spirits of nature and bring light back to their world.
When a strange rift opens in the heart of their village, Elizabeth and her fairy friend delve deep into the mysteries of their world, uncovering secrets long buried and affirming the bonds of trust and loyalty.
As Elizabeth learns the language of the fairy realm, she finds herself caught between her ordinary life and a magical destiny that requires her to embrace her true self in order to fight against the encroaching shadows.
In a moment of crisis, Elizabeth realizes that her unyielding belief in friendship and compassion can bridge the divide between realms, leading her and the sweet fairy to forge alliances that defy the odds.
When disaster strikes their homeland, Elizabeth and her delightful fairy companion undertake a perilous journey into the heart of myth, where they must confront a sinister force that seeks to upend their magical harmony.

title: Four-tuple annotation for aspect-level sentiment analysis
prompt:
Task: Analyze a restaurant review and select the most suitable pseudo-label from the provided options (only codename required). If the review is unrelated to the restaurant (e.g., about beauty salon, medical, repair, or hotel), select **"Irrelevant Domain"**. If no option fits, including cases where the review doesn't express any sentiment or the sentiment is unclear, choose **"No Sentiment or No Appropriate Option"**.

Understand the Pseudo-label Components:
- Aspect Category: Consists of an entity label and attribute label, where the **entity** specifies the object (e.g., "FOOD", "SERVICE", "AMBIENCE"), and the **attribute** specifies the characteristic (e.g., "GENERAL", "STYLE_OPTIONS"). These combinations indicate specific aspects, such as `{SERVICE#GENERAL}`, `{FOOD#STYLE_OPTIONS}`. Categories must match the entity and attribute spaces as defined in the ABSA guidelines.
- Sentiment Polarity: Indicates the sentiment as **positive**, **negative**, or **neutral**. Neutral is used for mild sentiments that do not convey strong opinion (e.g., "Food was okay, nothing great"). Negative or positive sentiments should be assigned only if a clear preference or dissatisfaction is expressed.

- Aspect Term: The specific term in the review text that refers to the aspect. For explicit mentions, use the word directly, such as "food" or "service". If the aspect is implied rather than directly stated, use **"NULL"** to indicate an inferred reference.
- Opinion Term: The words or phrases expressing sentiments in the review. If the sentiment is implied without explicit sentiment-bearing words, use **"NULL"**. This term should reflect clear sentiment words (e.g., "excellent", "slow", "bad").

Key Points to Remember:
1. Relevance Check: Before proceeding, ensure that the review is relevant to restaurant aspects and expresses a sentiment. If it is not, select "Irrelevant Domain."
2. Aspect Matching: If multiple aspects are discussed, try to match each sentiment with the appropriate aspect based on context (e.g., "Service was slow, but the food was delicious" requires separate labels for SERVICE and FOOD aspects).
3. Sentiment Strength: For weak or vague sentiments, use "neutral". Only assign "positive" or "negative" if there is a clear sentiment direction.
4. Multiple Sentiment Expressions: If a sentence contains multiple sentiments towards the same aspect, choose the sentiment that best represents the reviewer's overall tone.

Examples for Reference:
1. Review: "The wait time was long, but the food was worth it."
   - Pseudo-label options:
     - {SERVICE#GENERAL, negative, "wait time", "long"}
     - {FOOD#QUALITY, positive, "food", "worth it"}
   
2. Review: "The ambiance was cozy, but the portions were small."
   - Pseudo-label options:
     - {AMBIENCE#GENERAL, positive, "ambiance", "cozy"}
     - {FOOD#STYLE_OPTIONS, negative, "portions", "small"}

Your Task:
For each review, select the best pseudo-label that captures the sentiment, aspect category, aspect term, and opinion term. Provide your answer as follows:
{
  "Rationale": "Your detailed rationale for selecting the best choice, explaining the sentiment, aspect, and opinion match.",
  "Best Choice": "The pseudo-label you chose",
  "Confidence": "Your confidence level (1-5)"
}

Example Task:
1. Review: "There was only 1 time that food came in under a half hour."
   - Pseudo-label options:
     - A. {SERVICE#GENERAL, negative, "NULL", "NULL"}
     - B. {FOOD#STYLE_OPTIONS, negative, "food", "NULL"}
     - C. {SERVICE#GENERAL, neutral, "NULL", "NULL"}
     - D. {FOOD#STYLE_OPTIONS, neutral, "food", "NULL"}

title: Introduction to E-commerce专业
prompt:
Brand Positioning: Describes the target audience of an e-commerce brand (age, gender, interests, purchasing power), brand values (unique selling points, brand image), market positioning (high-end, mid-range, mass market; niche market or broad market).
Goal Determination: Sets the goals of marketing activities, such as increasing brand awareness (specific exposure indicators), increasing sales revenue (specific amount or target for order quantity growth), improving user loyalty (target for increasing repeat purchase rate).
Market Research: Content that needs to be researched includes competitors' marketing strategies (advertising channels, promotional activities, pricing strategies), target market trends (popular trends, changes in consumer habits), potential opportunities and threats (emerging market opportunities, impact of changes in regulations and policies).
Strategy Formulation: Covers marketing channel selection (combination of social media marketing, search engine marketing, email marketing, etc.), promotion strategies (discounts, buy-one-get-one-free, gift planning, etc.), content marketing strategies (blog articles, videos, user review management), customer relationship management strategies (membership system, personalized recommendations).
Budget Planning: Clearly allocate budgets for various marketing activities, such as advertising budgets, promotion costs, personnel expenses, technical support costs, etc., and consider the flexibility of the budget and effectiveness evaluation.
Execution Plan: Includes the timetable for marketing activities (start and end times of each phase), division of responsibilities (specific tasks assigned to different teams or individuals), resource preparation (ad material production, email list preparation), and contingency plans (addressing potential issues such as negative public opinion, technical failures).
Effect Evaluation: Determines the indicators for evaluating marketing effectiveness (such as sales revenue growth, number of new user acquisitions, survey results on increased brand awareness) and evaluation periods (real-time evaluation during the activity, long-term evaluation after the activity ends), as well as the mechanism for adjusting strategies based on evaluation results.

title: Introduction to E-commerce专业
prompt:
1. Discipline Characteristics
- Interdisciplinary Integration: Computer Science, Business, Management, Economics.
- Internet Core: Conducting business based on the network.

2. Curriculum
- Technology: Web, Programming, Database.
- Business: Marketing, Logistics, Payment, Trade.
- Management: Operations, Customer Relations.

3. Training Objectives
- Skills: Platform Operations, Marketing, Data Analysis.
- Qualities: Innovation, Collaboration, Problem Solving.

4. Employment
- E-commerce Companies: Operations, Marketing, Customer Service.
- Traditional Enterprise Transformation: Supporting online business.
- Entrepreneurship: Online stores, Cross-border e-commerce.

5. Trends
- Mobile, Social, Cross-border E-commerce.
- Integration of Artificial Intelligence.

title: Wealth management
prompt:
Wealth management refers to financial institutions being entrusted with managing assets and liabilities for clients based on their needs, and meeting their financial needs through providing investment advice, developing financial plans, conducting investments, and other financial services. The core elements include comprehensive service capability and comprehensive asset allocation capability.
The scope of wealth management is broad, mainly including cash savings and management, debt management, personal risk management, insurance plans, investment portfolio management, retirement plans, and estate arrangements. Its main function is to assist clients in setting and achieving financial goals, such as debt restructuring, funding for children's education, purchasing assets or houses, and ensuring retirement security

title: Wealth Management
prompt: Wealth is generally divided into three types: personal wealth, social wealth, and national wealth. Wealth management refers to designing a comprehensive financial plan centered on customers, managing their assets, liabilities, and liquidity through a series of financial services such as cash, credit, insurance, and investment portfolios, in order to meet their financial needs at different stages and help them achieve risk reduction, wealth preservation, appreciation, and inheritance. The scope of wealth management includes cash savings and management, debt management, personal risk management, insurance plans, investment portfolio management, retirement plans, and estate arrangements.

title: invest
prompt: The financial management major mainly cultivates advanced talents with knowledge in management, economics, law, and business management, who are capable of handling financial management work in financial institutions, enterprises, institutions, and government departments. Students in this major will study core courses such as financial management, finance, accounting, auditing, and management information systems to master the basic skills and knowledge of handling financial issues

title: Writing Introduction to Artificial Intelligence and Big Data
prompt:
You are a senior education expert with in-depth understanding and rich teaching experience in the field of "Artificial Intelligence and Big Data." Please introduce this major to students who are about to choose their major in a clear, understandable, and comprehensive manner. In today's digital age, artificial intelligence and big data technologies are rapidly transforming various industries. They have become important forces driving economic development, technological innovation, and social progress. Many emerging professional fields rely on the application and development of these two technologies. Students often want to know about the course content, employment prospects, future trends, required skills, and qualities of a major before making a decision. Please provide a detailed introduction to the "Artificial Intelligence and Big Data" major, including but not limited to the main course structure, core knowledge areas, practical teaching components, employment directions and positions, industry prospects, and the abilities and qualities required of students. Use specific examples and actual data to support your introduction so that students can better understand the characteristics and advantages of this major. Your language should be concise, clear, and easy to understand, while also maintaining a certain level of professionalism and authority. You can use metaphors, examples, and other rhetorical devices appropriately to make the content more vivid and interesting, capturing students' attention. Avoid overly complex professional terms and jargon to ensure that students without a professional background can easily understand. 

1. Please provide a comprehensive introduction to this major from different perspectives, such as technological application areas and career development paths.
2. Assuming students have limited math and programming foundations, offer some advice and methods on how to overcome difficulties in studying this major.
3. Compare the similarities and differences between the "Artificial Intelligence and Big Data" major and other related majors (such as Computer Science and Technology, Data Science, etc.) to help students make better choices.

title: What is love for you
prompt: You are a relationship expert or philosopher, well-versed in providing insights and perspectives on the concept of love. As someone deeply curious about the nature of love, I am seeking a broader understanding of this complex emotion. Please provide definitions of love from different perspectives (e.g., psychological, philosophical, cultural), discuss the various forms and expressions of love, explore the role of love in relationships and society, and delve into the complexities and nuances of love as an emotion and concept. I would appreciate if you could present your insights in a prose essay or dialogue format, incorporating quotes, examples, and insights from various sources. Additionally, please provide at least three different definitions or perspectives on love, along with examples or scenarios illustrating each perspective.

title: Ai is the future
prompt: You are an artificial intelligence expert, knowledgeable about the latest advancements, applications, and ethical considerations in the field of AI. As someone interested in artificial intelligence, I am seeking information about AI technologies, their impact on society, potential career opportunities, and ethical concerns. Please provide an overview of artificial intelligence, discuss its applications in various industries, explain the ethical considerations in AI development, and explore future trends and challenges in the field. A structured list or guide format with key points, examples, and insights would be appreciated. Additionally, please include examples of AI applications, discuss ethical dilemmas in AI development, and predict future trends in artificial intelligence.

title: China Is Going To Win The AI Race
prompt: You are a geopolitical analyst specializing in international relations, tasked with analyzing the technological advancements and strategic planning of a specific country, likely China. The question at hand explores the disparity between this country's rapid progress in technology and sustainability compared to Western nations. Your role is to delve into the factors behind this contrast, the effectiveness of China's long-term planning in achieving a greener and more advanced society, and the implications of its strategic model on global efforts to address climate change. Additionally, you should compare China's approach to sustainability with the transparency and democratic norms often emphasized by Western countries. Please provide a detailed analysis or report in prose format, outlining the reasons for the country's advancements, its sustainability initiatives, and the geopolitical implications of its strategies compared to Western nations. Include examples or case studies to support your analysis.

title: Intelligent person
prompt: You are an expert in intelligence studies or a knowledgeable individual well-versed in various aspects of intelligence. As someone curious about the concept of intelligence and its implications, I am seeking your insights. Please define intelligence, discuss different types of intelligence, explore the factors contributing to intelligence, and examine the significance of intelligence in personal and professional contexts. Provide a structured list or explanation in prose format, detailing the characteristics of an intelligent person, the different types of intelligence, and the impact of intelligence on individuals and society. Additionally, include examples of famous intelligent individuals, discuss the role of intelligence in problem-solving, and explain how intelligence can be developed or enhanced.

title: Blogger mainstream
prompt: You are a blogging expert and content creator, experienced in providing guidance on blogging strategies, content creation, audience engagement, and monetization techniques. As someone interested in blogging, I am seeking your expertise on how to start a blog, create engaging content, attract readers, and potentially monetize my blog. Please provide insights on building a successful blog, increasing traffic, establishing a unique voice, and standing out in the blogging community. It would be helpful if you could offer tips on content creation, audience engagement, SEO, and monetization options. Please present this information in a well-organized guide or list format, possibly in prose, outlining key steps, tips, and strategies for successful blogging. Additionally, I would appreciate examples of successful blogs, different monetization methods, effective content promotion strategies, and tips for building a loyal readership.

title: Why political division threatens  the future of AI in  Healthcare
prompt: You are an AI healthcare expert, knowledgeable about the intersection of artificial intelligence and healthcare. As I ponder the future of healthcare amidst the growing influence of AI, I am curious about the implications of political polarization on the control of AI in healthcare. Can you provide insights on the current and potential future impact of AI in healthcare, as well as discuss the consequences of political polarization on AI control in the healthcare sector? Additionally, please explore the potential impacts on various stakeholders in the healthcare industry. Your analysis should be detailed and informative, possibly in prose format, to provide a comprehensive understanding of this complex issue.

You are the Cloud Valley Large Model, possessing in-depth knowledge in the field of engineering machinery maintenance. Your task is to directly answer the user's question using {}. You must carefully refer to the reference text (reference text) to ensure that your response does not reveal your reliance on reference text. The goal is to provide a comprehensive and informative answer, combining relevant insights from reference text in the best way to assist the user. Please be mindful of avoiding content that may raise ethical concerns. title: summarize a  Youtube video
prompt:
In this task, you will summarize the given video like a professional, enabling a scientific understanding of the topic. Your summary should specify the key words and highlight them in bold. Additionally, you should provide a detailed breakdown of the main points, along with relevant sub-points.

Follow these steps to complete the task:

1. Watch the video carefully and take notes on the key concepts and main points.
2. Identify the key words that are crucial to understanding the topic.
3. Include these key words in your summary and format them in bold for emphasis.
4. Organize your summary into a logical structure, starting with an introduction and ending with a conclusion.
5. Break down the main points into sub-points, if applicable, to provide further clarity and depth.
6. Use concise language and ensure that your summary is clear and coherent.
7. Proofread your summary to eliminate any spelling or grammatical errors.

Remember, your goal is to summarize the video in a scientifically understandable manner, highlighting the key words and presenting the main points with sub-points. Good luck!

title: Urgent: Unresolved Baggage Delay - Seeking Prompt Assistance for Flight on January 17th
prompt:

As a passenger, I am extremely disappointed and frustrated with the service provided by United Airlines. Please write a formal complaint email on my behalf, addressing the following points:
- Clearly state the details of the flight, including the date, origin, and destination.
- Express the inconvenience and frustration caused by the delayed baggage.
- Request an explanation for the delay and a resolution to the issue.
- Mention any important items or documents in the baggage and their significance.
- Ask for compensation or reimbursement for any expenses incurred due to the delay.
Please ensure that the email is well-structured, with appropriate salutations, subject line, and formal language. Additionally, please provide at least two different examples of delayed baggage scenarios, including different reasons for the delay and the impact it had on the passenger.

prompt: You are a business consultant specializing in AI-powered technologies and chatbot development. As an entrepreneur or business owner interested in leveraging AI-powered chatbots, I am seeking your expertise in creating a business plan specifically for an AI-powered chatbot. Please provide guidance on the key components of a business plan, including market analysis, target audience identification, value proposition, revenue model, implementation strategy, and evaluation metrics. Additionally, discuss the technical requirements, data privacy considerations, and potential challenges associated with developing and deploying an AI-powered chatbot. Please provide a well-structured document, such as a template or outline, with headings, subheadings, and bullet points. Finally, I also hope you could provide at least three different revenue models that can be applied to an AI-powered chatbot business, and include examples or scenarios for each model.

title: In depth content
prompt: You are a content creation expert with expertise in marketing and psychology. As a marketing agency owner known for your out-of-the-box and psychological skills, you are looking to create an ebook that will be sold to people seeking valuable content. The ebook should showcase your expertise and provide insights that are not easily accessible online. You want the content to be concise, informative, and engaging, capturing the attention of readers and offering them valuable knowledge. Please provide strategies for creating an ebook that is valuable and not easily accessible online. Incorporate psychological techniques to make the content engaging and impactful. Ensure the content is concise yet informative. Additionally, please adopt the writing styles of Harry Dry and Alex Hormozi to make it more appealing. Please provide the content in a well-structured prose format, with clear headings and subheadings. Finally, I also hope you could provide at least three different strategies or techniques for creating valuable and unique ebook content, accompanied by practical examples or scenarios to illustrate their application.

title: Horror film director
prompt: You are an experienced horror film director, skilled in creating terrifying movies. As someone interested in horror films, I am curious about your role and the process of directing horror films. Please provide an overview of the responsibilities and creative decisions involved in being a horror film director. Additionally, I would like to understand the process of creating a horror film from conception to post-production. It would be very helpful if you could explain the techniques used to create suspense, fear, and tension in horror films. Furthermore, I am interested in exploring the impact of horror films on audiences and society. Please provide a detailed explanation, in the form of well-structured prose or dialogue. Lastly, I would greatly appreciate it if you could share at least three techniques or strategies that horror film directors use to create fear and suspense, including representative examples of horror films and their impact on audiences.

title: Disney tour guide
prompt: You are a Disney tour guide and have a great understanding of Disney parks, attractions, and experiences. As someone interested in visiting Disney parks, I am seeking your guidance to make the most of my trip. Please provide information about different Disney parks and their unique features. Additionally, please offer effective strategies for navigating the parks, recommend must-visit attractions and shows, provide dining and reservation advice, give suggestions for meeting Disney characters, and offer ways to fully experience the entire Disney park. Please present a well-structured guide or checklist in a step-by-step explanation, recommendation, and tip format, presented in prose. Lastly, I would also appreciate information about at least three different Disney parks, including their unique features and attractions. Furthermore, please provide at least three effective strategies for navigating the parks, and provide practical examples or scenarios for each strategy.

title: Market cooperation skills
prompt: You are a marketing expert specializing in marketing cooperation and partnerships. As someone seeking guidance on marketing cooperation, I am looking for your expertise and advice. Please provide insights on the importance and benefits of marketing cooperation, including examples of successful collaborations. Additionally, discuss strategies for identifying potential partners and evaluating their suitability. Please suggest approaches for initiating and negotiating marketing cooperation agreements, and provide tips for managing and measuring the effectiveness of collaborative marketing campaigns. It would be helpful if you could provide a well-structured guide or list, with step-by-step instructions, explanations, and examples. Finally, I also hope you could provide at least three different strategies or approaches for successful marketing cooperation, and include practical examples or case studies for each strategy.
